page.title: 09Playground Games
page.content:
We play skipping.There's a song I know called raspberry,strawberry,my jam tart, Tell me the name of your sweetheart.Then you chant the alphabet and if you land on f you choose a name like Fred. Beth Thompson
We play Cinderella.We skip and say: Cinderella dressed in yella Went upstairs to kiss a fella She kissed a snake,by mistake How many doctors did it take? 5,10,15,20..... you count until the rope stops. Mandy Davies
We play Granny's Footsteps and I like to be Granny.When I turn round they must stand still.If they move they're out. Charlotte Taylor
